Stone Skin.name: Stone Skin
Stone Skin.blurb: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
Stone Skin.description: Innate: Wukong gains 4 / 6 / 8 (based on level) bonus  armor and  magic resistance for each  visible enemy  champion nearby.
Stone Skin.notes: * Decoys are considered champions for Stone Skin.

Crushing Blow.name: Crushing Blow
Crushing Blow.blurb: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
Crushing Blow.description: Active: Wukong's next basic attack within 5 seconds gains  125 bonus range, deals  modified physical damage and reduces  his target's armor for 3 seconds.
Crushing Blow.leveling:
Modified Physical Damage:
10 / 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 (+ 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 / 140% AD)

Armor Reduction:
10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30% of target's armor
Crushing Blow.description2: Crushing Blow resets Wukong's autoattack timer.
Crushing Blow.notes:
* Crushing Blow has no cast time.
 This will trigger upon structures and wards (save for the debuff).
 Both the damage and the armor reduction debuff are negated if the attack is  dodged or  blocked.
 If the attack  misses Crushing Blow will not go on cooldown, allowing the empowered attack to be re-used.

  Spell shield will block the damage and debuff.
 Performing an action after the animation is played, but before dealing damage will start the attack timer, and you must wait before you attack again, although the buff is not lost.

Decoy.name: Decoy
Decoy.blurb: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
Decoy.description: Active: Wukong is  pushed 100 units away, entering  invisibility for 1.5 seconds and leaving behind a decoy of himself.
Decoy.description2: After 1.5 seconds, the decoy performs a circular attack around itself for 0.5 seconds, dealing  magic damage to all nearby enemies before disappearing.
Decoy.notes:
* Decoy has no cast time.
 If the decoy is killed before it vanishes, it will not deal any damage.
 The Decoy cannot be targeted by allies, unless it's from an auto-targeted effect (i.e  Heal,  Divine Judgement).
 Killing it rewards  25 and  44.

Nimbus Strike.name: Nimbus Strike
Nimbus Strike.blurb: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
Nimbus Strike.description: Active: Wukong  dashes on a cloud to the target enemy and sends out  untargetable clones to attack up to two additional enemies near the primary target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck. The clones can block non-targeted attacks or abilities for 0.25 seconds after hitting their targets.
Nimbus Strike.description2: Upon hitting his target, Wukong gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
Nimbus Strike.notes:
* It applies a stack of  Electrocute /  Phase Rush even if the target is  untargetable.
 The created clones are considered champions for  Turret Plating's  gold sharing.

Cyclone.name: Cyclone
Cyclone.blurb: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
Cyclone.description: Active: Wukong spins his staff around for up to 4 seconds, becomes  pacified and gains  5% − 40% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Reactivating Cyclone cancels it immediately.
Cyclone.description2: The spin deals physical damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds. Enemies affected by Cyclone for the first time are briefly  knocked up.
Cyclone.leveling2:
Physical Damage Per Tick:
10 / 32.5 / 55 / 77.5 / 100 (+ 55% AD)
Total Physical Damage:
80 / 260 / 440 / 620 / 800 (+ 440% AD)
Cyclone.notes:
* While spinning, summoner spells and item actives can still be used, with the exception of Crescent, the active portion of  Tiamat,  Ravenous Hydra and  Titanic Hydra.
  Spell shield will block one second of damage.
